name: Riftbound (itch)
description:
In grim times, all you have to do is survive. Welcome to Riftbound.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look Around

Left Click - Normal Attack

Hold Left Click - Charge Attack

Right Click - Special Attack

Space - Evade

Q and E - Change Weapon

F - Interact

P - Use Potion
